sys_ux_client_script.name: handle_search

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_b8d6795647bf0210c637224f316d43ea
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Search Page">74d6711647bf0210c637224f316d4317</macroponent><name>handle_search</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, helpers }) {
    const fields = {
        searchContextConfigId: api.context.props.searchContextConfigId
    };
    const params = {
        searchFilters: api.context.props.searchFilters
    };
    
	if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_RESULTS_CONTAINER#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = true;
        
  	} else if (event.name === 'SN_SEARCH_COMBOBOX#SEARCH_EXECUTED') {
		fields.searchTerm = event.payload.searchTerm;
		params.disableSpellCheck = false;
        console.log("search clicked");
        api.setState('loading', true);
        api.setState('searchTerm', event.payload.searchTerm);
  	}
	//helpers.navigate.to('search', fields, params);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-05 22:48:37</sys_created_on><sys_id>b8d6795647bf0210c637224f316d43ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>handle_search</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Integrations" source="x_820501_integrate">c22f2bd52f26bd105250d39df699b6a8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Integrations">c22f2bd52f26bd105250d39df699b6a8</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_b8d6795647bf0210c637224f316d43ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-05 22:48:37</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
